dataset_id: LBA-ECO LC-23 ASTER and MODIS Fire Data Comparison for Brazil: 2003-2004
title: LBA-ECO LC-23 ASTER and MODIS Fire Data Comparison for Brazil: 2003-2004
summary: This data set contains data associated with MODIS fire maps generated using two different algorithms and compared against fire maps produced by ASTER. These data relate to a paper (Morisette et al., 2005) that describes the use of high spatial resolution ASTER data to evaluate the characteristics of two fire detection algorithms, both applied to MODIS-Terra data and both operationally producing publicly available fire locations. The two algorithms are NASA's operational Earth Observing System MODIS fire detection product and Brazil's National Institute for Space Research (INPE) algorithm. These data are the ASCII files used in the logistic regression and error matrices presented in the paper.
